transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Main bol rahi hu Tejash Sodani bol raha hu Tejash Sodani.
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan Ritika mam bol rahe hai na?
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Haan Ritika mam bol rahe hai na?
Executive: Haan ji sir Ritika baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Tejash Sodani bol raha hu mam bol raha hu Tejash Sodani se.
Executive: Bataye sir.
Customer: Mam mujhe ye tha kya mera jo plan hai uske andar mera website development ka bhi ek ye tha.
Customer: Mujhe kuch dikh nahi raha hai mera website development ka kuch bhi hua hai iske andar.
Executive: Sir aapka jo plan hai wo to TrustSeal hai na.
Customer: Haan TrustSeal hai par maine wo bhi add on karke liya tha I think so ek bar aap check kar sakte ho kya?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi haan sir maine wo check kiya tha kyuki pehle bhi aapka kuch aa raha tha mere pass notification.
Executive: To hamara jo ye TrustSeal wala plan hai na sir isme hamara website wala nahi hota hai website ke liye different hamara isse upar wala plan hota hai Maximizer.
Executive: Jisme hamara TrustSeal bhi complimentary rehta hai aur plus usme hamara own domain par hum services run karte hai aapki aapka website banate hai aur usme aapka mobile template alag hota hai desktop template different hota hai plus char corporate emails aapko milti hai.
Executive: Jaise ki for example aap bolte ho for example Maurishoppy.com for example to usme aap kya le sakte ho jaise marketing ka le sakte ho marketing@maurishoppy.com aap kehte ho ek mujhe mere naam ka de dijiye to tejash@ is tarike se char corporate emails rehta hai and plus aapka jo weekly buyleads hai wo 44 ho jata hai sir usme to wo aapka jo plan hai wo Maximizer ka plan hai TrustSeal mein own domain services nahi hoti hai wo sab domain hi hoti hai sir.
Customer: Okay to kya charges hote hai mam Maximizer mein aapke?
Executive: Sir abhi aapka jo ye wala plan chal raha hai to I think isse bahut jyada samay to nahi hua hai iska bhi abhi fund I think bach hi raha hoga.
Customer: Haan bahut bada baki hai mam abhi just shuru kiya hai maine.
Executive: Thik hai to sir agar agar kuch aisi urgency na ho to main ek bar calculate karke aapko
Customer: Chalega mam inquiry kyuki main abhi ek chalega kuch problem nahi kyuki main ek IndiaMART ka ek profile hi check kar raha tha kyuki aur buyer ka uska jo profile dekha usme proper uska website
Executive: Achha achha achha.
Customer: Haan haan haan I think to wo hoga.
Executive: Sir Maximizer hi hoga kyuki sir different profile aapko dikhti hai na agar kisi bhi client ki to Maximizer mein hi dikhti hai warna sabka profile bilkul same rehta hai koi dikkat nahi hai main ek kam karti hu sir aaj hai na actually thoda sa meri tabiyat thik nahi hai aur
Customer: Koi aadhe ghante nahi hai mam bas main inquiry kar raha tha.
Executive: Thik hai kal hamara sir off hai parso main aapko call kar leti hu khud hi aur ek bar aapko pura adjustment nikal kar ke tab aapko ek bar samjha deti hu kitna charges aap mujhe thoda samjha agar thik rahega kuch jyada charges nahi rahenge to we will go for that ya fir we will drop that.
Executive: No problem.
Executive: No problem sir hum ek kam karenge hum hai na video meet kar lenge balki parso.
Executive: To aapko bhi hai na pehle easily samajh mein aa jayega kya kaisa rehta hai kya benefits hai aur acche acche abhi to maine aapko orally bataya hai main aapko usme properly ek bar dikha dungi aapke jo kuch competitors hai jinka already chal raha hoga to aap dekh lena thik hai aur ya fir aap jo bhi mujhe apna wo chahoge domain wo bhi hum ek bar check kar lenge kya available hai kya nahi hai kyuki mera khud ka bhi ek website pehle se ek hai usko kuch link kar sakte hai hum log aisa kuch hoga aisa kuch kar sakte hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi IndiaMART ka ek link nahi banega aapka haan lekin ye hai ki user experience bahut achcha ho jata hai usme main aapko pura samjha dungi don't worry hai na aap charges mein bhi jo bhi best to best ho sakega wo aapko kara ke dungi don't worry hai na.
Customer: Thik hai bataye.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai thank you.
(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's plan should include website development.

- Wants to know charges for Maximizer plan.



Resolution:

- Explained TrustSeal plan does not include website.

- Explained Maximizer plan benefits and features.

- Offered to calculate and explain charges later.

- Proposed a video call to explain the plan.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer the day after tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, maximizer plan, trustseal, website development
